remarks: Membership in a one-parameter class of sets.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)
statement:
elmptrab.f $e |- F = ( x e. D |-> { y e. B | ph } ) $.
elmptrab.s1 $e |- ( ( x = X /\ y = Y ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
elmptrab.s2 $e |- ( x = X -> B = C ) $.
elmptrab.ex $e |- ( x e. D -> B e. V ) $.
elmptrab $p |- ( Y e. ( F ` X ) <-> ( X e. D /\ Y e. C /\ ps ) ) $.
$d B y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x $.
$d V x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d ps x y $.
